item.description:
Come paint pottery with us at Clayground in East Greenwich! (East Greenwich is about 20 minutes outside of Providence. Directions below. Let us know if you need a ride.)



Here's the info from the Clayground site:

  • Prices are all-inclusive:(pottery, paint and firing) and start at $6 and up.
  • Select a piece of pottery from over 200 shapes. We have functional items like bowls, mug, plates and platters or decorative vases, boxes and figures.
  • Plan your design. Check out our samples throughout the store or use our stamps, sponges, stencils and books for design ideas.
  • Select your colors and paint!
  • When your complete your project, leave it with us and we?ll glaze and fire it in our kiln.
  • Come back in five days and pick up your masterpiece.




DIRECTIONS FROM PROVIDENCE:

Take I-95 South to Exit 9 - Route 4 South. Take Route 4 South to Exit 7 - RI 402/RI 403. Bear right on exit ramp towards RI 402. At top of ramp, take right onto Frenchtown Road. Follow Frenchtown Road for 1.2 Miles. Turn left onto Post Rd/ US 1-North. Clayground is 0.7 miles on the right in the Benny's Plaza.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll email my cell phone number to any new names on the RSVP list, so if you come in and can't find us, you can give me a call.
item.name: Paint Your Own Pottery at Clayground
